CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ polymer solar cells |
| new polymer donor materials |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ polymer solar cells |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| power conversion efficiency |
| 7% |
| new polymer donor materials |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Explanation:

* "power conversion efficiency" is a property of solar cells that measures how efficiently they convert light into electricity.
* "7%" is a specific value of the power conversion efficiency.
* "new polymer donor materials" is a property of the solar cells, referring to the materials used in their construction.
* "[6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)" and "[6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" are specific types of electron acceptors used in the construction of the solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| new polymer donor materials |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Explanation:

* "new polymer donor materials" is a property of the solar cells, referring to the materials used in their construction.
* "[6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)" and "[6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" are specific types of electron acceptors used in the construction of the solar cells.

The other entities in the original paragraph, "power conversion efficiency" and "7%", do not clearly refer to material properties and have been removed.
